definitions.text: cause annoyance in; disturb, especially by minor irritations
examples: Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really bothers me
It irritates me that she never closes the door after she leaves

definitions.text: excite to an abnormal condition, or chafe or inflame
excite to some characteristic action or condition, such as motion, contraction, or nervous impulse, by the application of a stimulus
examples: irritate the glands of a leaf
tapping an annoying rhythm on his glass with his fork
aircraft noise is particularly bothersome near the airport
found it galling to have to ask permission
a teasing and persistent thought annoyed him
it is vexing to have to admit you are wrong

definitions.text: (used of physical stimuli) serving to stimulate or excite

examples: bites of black flies are more than irritating; they can be very painful
